items.name: NL Woordenboek
items.url: javascript:(function()%7B(function nlwikt() %7B%2F* Try to get the parameter string from the bookmarklet%2Fsearch query.Fall back to the current text selection%2C if any. If those optionsboth fail%2C prompt the user.*%2Fvar s %3D (function () %7B %2F*%25s*%2F%3B %7D).toString().replace(%2F%5Efunction%5Cs*%5C(%5Cs*%5C)%5Cs*%5C%7B%5Cs*%5C%2F%5C*%2F%2C '').replace(%2F%5C*%5C%2F%5Cs*%5C%3B%3F%5Cs*%5C%7D%5Cs*%24%2F%2C '').replace(%2F%5Cu0025s%2F%2C '')%3B%2F*** Get the active text selection%2C diving into frames and* text controls when necessary and possible.*%2Ffunction getActiveSelection(doc) %7Bif (arguments.length %3D%3D%3D 0) %7Bdoc %3D document%3B%7Dif (!doc %7C%7C typeof doc.getSelection !%3D%3D 'function') %7Breturn ''%3B%7Dif (!doc.activeElement) %7Breturn doc.getSelection() %2B ''%3B%7Dvar activeElement %3D doc.activeElement%3B%2F* Recurse for FRAMEs and IFRAMEs. *%2Ftry %7Bif (typeof activeElement.contentDocument %3D%3D%3D 'object'%26%26 activeElement.contentDocument !%3D%3D null) %7Breturn getActiveSelection(activeElement.contentDocument)%3B%7D%7D catch (e) %7Breturn doc.getSelection() %2B ''%3B%7D%2F* Get the selection from inside a text control. *%2Fif (typeof activeElement.value %3D%3D%3D 'string') %7Bif (activeElement.selectionStart !%3D%3D activeElement.selectionEnd) %7Breturn activeElement.value.substring(activeElement.selectionStart%2C activeElement.selectionEnd)%3B%7Dreturn activeElement.value%3B%7D%2F* Get the normal selection. *%2Freturn doc.getSelection() %2B ''%3B%7Dif (s %3D%3D%3D '') %7Bs %3D getActiveSelection() %7C%7C prompt('Typ een woord in om op te zoeken in het Nederlandse woordenboek%3A')%3B%7D else %7Bs %3D s.replace(%2F(%5E%7C%5Cs%7C")~("%7C%5Cs%7C%24)%2Fg%2C '%241' %2B getActiveSelection() %2B '%242')%3B%7Dif (s) %7Blocation %3D 'https%3A%2F%2Fnl.wiktionary.org%2Fwiki%2F' %2B encodeURIComponent(s)%3B%7D%7D)()%7D)()

5Cs%7C%24)%2Fg%2C%20'%241'%20%2B%20getActiveSelection()%20%2B%20'%242')%3B%7Dif%20(s)%20%7Blocation%20%3D%20'https%3A%2F%2Fen.wiktionary.org%2Fwiki%2F'%20%2B%20encodeURIComponent(s)%3B%7D%7D)()%7D)()

items.name: YouTube > MP3

items.name: YT Scroll+
items.url: javascript:(function()%7B%2F* keep video on top right when scrolling *%2Ffunction videoAnchor() %7Bvar miniplayer %3D document.getElementsByClassName("miniplayer")%5B0%5D%3Bif (miniplayer.parentElement.active) %7Breturn%3B%7Dvar player %3D document.getElementById("movie_player")%3Bvar video %3D document.getElementsByTagName("video")%5B0%5D%3Bvar control %3D document.getElementsByClassName("ytp-chrome-bottom")%5B0%5D%3Bvar mastRect %3D document.getElementById("masthead-container").getBoundingClientRect()%3Bvar theaterRect %3D document.getElementById("player-container").getBoundingClientRect()%3Bplayer.removeAttribute("style")%3B %2F* reset for theaterRect height *%2Fvar playerRect %3D player.getBoundingClientRect()%3Bvar videoRect %3D video.getBoundingClientRect()%3Bif (theaterRect.bottom < mastRect.height) %7Bvar comment %3D (document.getElementById("primary-inner") %7C%7Cdocument.getElementById("primary"))%3Bvar commentRect %3D comment.getBoundingClientRect()%3Bvar widthRatio %3D (window.innerWidth - commentRect.right) %2F videoRect.width%3Bvar heightRatio %3D window.innerHeight %2F videoRect.height%3Bplayer.style.position %3D "fixed"%3Bplayer.style.right %3D 0%3Bplayer.style.top %3D mastRect.height %2B "px"%3Bplayer.style.width %3D videoRect.width %2B "px"%3Bplayer.style.height %3D videoRect.height %2B "px"%3Bplayer.style.transformOrigin %3D "right top"%3Bplayer.style.transform %3D "scale(" %2B Math.min(widthRatio%2C heightRatio) %2B ")"%3Bplayer.style.zIndex %3D 1500%3Bcontrol.style.left %3D "12px"%3Bcontrol.style.width %3D (videoRect.width - 24) %2B "px"%3Bvideo.style.left %3D 0%3B%7Delse %7Bcontrol.style.left %3D "12px"%3Bcontrol.style.width %3D (playerRect.width - 24) %2B "px"%3Bvideo.style.left %3D (playerRect.width - videoRect.width) %2F 2 %2B "px"%3B%7D%7D%2F* keep scroll position on timestamp click *%2Ffunction scrollAnchor() %7Bvar x %3D window.scrollX%3Bvar y %3D window.scrollY%3BrequestAnimationFrame(function () %7Bwindow.scrollTo(x%2C y)%3B%7D)%3B%7Dwindow.addEventListener("scroll"%2C videoAnchor)%3Bwindow.addEventListener("resize"%2C videoAnchor)%3Bwindow.addEventListener("click"%2C scrollAnchor)%7D)()

items.name: Open all links
items.url: javascript:(function(){ var n_to_open,dl,dll,i; var got = {}; function linkIsSafe(u) { if (u.substr(0,7)=='mailto:') return false; if (u.substr(0,11)=='javascript:') return false; if (got[u]==1) return false; got[u] = 1; return true; } n_to_open = 0; dl = document.links; dll = dl.length; for(i = 0; i < dll; ++i) { if (linkIsSafe(dl[i].href)) ++n_to_open; } if (!n_to_open) { alert ('geen links gevonden'); } else { if (confirm('' + n_to_open + ' links openen?')) { for (var url in got) { window.open(url); } } } })();

items.name: Find&Replace
items.url: javascript:var count=0;function htmlreplace(a,b,element){if(!element)element=document.body;var nodes=element.childNodes;for(var n=0;n<nodes.length;n++){   if(nodes[n].type&&nodes[n].type.toLowerCase()=='textarea'){      var r=new RegExp(a,'gim');      if(nodes[n].value.match(r)){        count++;      }      nodes[n].value=nodes[n].value.replace(r,b)    }    else if(nodes[n].nodeValue && nodes[n].nodeValue.length > 0){      var r=new RegExp(a,'gim');      if(nodes[n].nodeValue.match(r)){        count++;      }      nodes[n].nodeValue=nodes[n].nodeValue.replace(r,b)    }    else{      htmlreplace(a,b,nodes[n])    }  }}htmlreplace(prompt('find'),prompt('replace'));alert('replaced '+count+' words.');

items.name: Broken

items.name: Hide text
items.url: javascript:(function(){ var style = document.createElement(%27style%27), styleContent = document.createTextNode(%27*{ color: transparent!important }%27); style.appendChild(styleContent ); var caput = document.getElementsByTagName(%27head%27); caput[0].appendChild(style); })();

items.name: WebCorrupt
items.url: javascript:(function(){function corruptByte(){var str=document.body.innerHTML;var rin=Math.random()*str.length;var ran=str.charAt(rin);var rin2=Math.random()*str.length;var ran2=str.charAt(rin2);var res=str.replace(ran,ran2);document.body.innerHTML=res;}function repeat(func,times){func();times&&--times&&repeat(func,times);}var corruptionAmount=prompt("How many bytes to corrupt?");if(Math.sign(corruptionAmount)==1){repeat(function(){corruptByte();},corruptionAmount);}})();

items.name: Cookie Overload
items.url: javascript:(function(){function makeid(length){var result='';var characters='ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789_-';var charactersLength=characters.length;for(var i=0;i<length;i++){result+=characters.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random()*charactersLength));}return result;}setInterval(function(){var randomNumber=Math.floor((Math.random()*100)+1);document.cookie=(makeid(randomNumber)+"="+makeid(randomNumber));},100);})();

items.name: Fake Chrome Error
items.url: javascript:(function(){var Cerror=prompt("Kies een error (1-5) 1:Chrome OS is missing or damaged 2:Kan niet inloggen 3:GPU Failure");switch(Cerror){case "1":document.write("");document.body.requestFullscreen();break;case "2":document.write("");document.body.requestFullscreen();break;case "3":document.write("");document.body.requestFullscreen();break;default:break;}})();
